title: Dorothea [Widescreen]
creator_credit: AFTRS, Anna Grieve and Wendy Chandler
brief_description: A young Greek woman, Dorothea, escapes her family’s resistance to adopting new ways and an arranged marriage by becoming involved in a theatre group and falling for the lead performer. Cast includes Helen Dullas, William Dye and Saavas Panas.
